data.content: Too Hazar Bar Bhi Roothe To Mna Lunga Tujhe Magar Dekh Mohabbat Me Shamil Koi Dusra Na Ho
Kismat Yah Mera Imtehaan Le Rahi Hai Tadap Kar Yah Mujhe Dard De Rahi Hai Dil Se Kabhi Bhi Mainne Use Door Nahi Kiya Phir Kyon Bewfai Ka Woh Ilazaam De Rahi Hai
Mare To Lakhon Hongey Tujhpar Main To Tere Saath Jeena Chhaahta Hun
Wapas Laut Aaya Hai Hawaon Ka Rukh Modne Wala Dil Me Fir Utar Raha Hai Dil Todne Wale
Apanon Ke Beech Begaane Ho Gae Hain Pyaar Ke Lamhe Anajaane Ho Gae Hain Jahaan Par Phool Khilate The Kabhi Aaj Vahaan Par Viraan Ho Gae Hain
Jo Shakhs Tere Tasawwur Se He Mahak Jaye Socho Tumhare Didar Me Uska Kya Hoga
Mohabbat Ka Ehsas To Hum Dono Ko Hua Tha Fark Sirf Itna Tha Ki Usne Kiya Tha Aur Mujhe Hua Tha
Saanson Ki Dor Chhootatee Ja Rahi Hai Kismat Bhi Hame Dard Deti Ja Rahee Hai Maut Ki Taraph Hain Kadam Hamaare Mohabbat Bhi Ham Se Chhootati Ja Rahi Hai
Samjhta Hi Nahi Wo Mere Alfaz Ki Gahrayi Maine Har Lafz Kah Diya Jise Mohabbat Kahte Hai
Samandar Na Sahi Par Ek Nadi To Honi Chahiye Tere Shahar Me Zindagi Kahin To Honi Chahiye
Nazaron Se Dekho Toh Aabaad Ham Hain Dil Se Dekho Toh Barbaad Ham Hain Ziwan Ka Har Lamha Dard Se Bhar Gaya Phir Kaise Kah Den Aazaad Ham Hain
Mujhe Nahi Maloom Woh Pehli Baar Kab Acha Laga Magar Uske Baad Kabhi Bura Bhi Nahi
Sacchi Mohabbat Kabhi Khatam Nahi Hoti Waqt Ke Saath Khamosh Ho Jati Hai
Zindagi Ke Safar Mein Aapaka Sahaara Chaahie Aapake Charanon Ka Bas Aasara Chaahie Har Mushkilon Ka Hansate Hue Saamana Karenge Bas Thaakur Ji Aapaka Ek Ishaara Chaahie
Jis Dil Main Basa Tha Naam Tera Humne Wo Tod Diya Na Hone Diya Tujhe Badnaam Bas Tere Naam Lena Chod Diya
Pyaar Wo Nhi Jo Hasil Karne Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karva De Pyaar Wo Hai Jo Uski Khusi Ke Liye Apne Armaan Chor De
Hum Ishq Ke Wo Mukaam Par Khade Hai Jahan Dil Kisi Aur Ko Chahe To Gunha Lagta Hai
Sacche Pyaar Walo Ko Hmesha Log Glat Hi Samjhte Hai Jabki Time Pass Walo Se Log Khush Rehte Hai Aaj Kal
Sirf Waqt Gujarna Ho To Kisi Aur Ko Apna Bana Lena Hum Dosti Bhi Karte Hai To Piyar Ki Tarah
Jaroori Nahi Ishq Me Banhoon Ke Share Hi Mile Kisi Ko Ji Bhar Ke Mahsoos Karna Bhi Mohabbat Hai
Humne Bhi Ek Aise Shakhs Ko Chaha Jisko Bhula Na Sake Aur Wo Kismat Main Bhi Nahi
Sachcha Pyar Kisi Bhoot Ki Tarah Hota Hai Bate To Sab Karte Hai Dekha Kisi Ne Nahi
Duniya Ko Aag Lagane Ki Zarurat Nahi To Mere Saath Chsl Aag Khud Lag Jayegi
Taras Gye Hai Hum Tere Muh Se Kuch Sunne Ko Hum Pyaar Ki Baat Na Sahi Koi Shikayat Hi Kar De
Karne Lage Jab Shikwa Usse Uski Bewafai Ka Rakh Kar Hont Ko Hont Se Khamosh Kar Diya
Mohabbat Hai Ya Nasha Tha Jo Bhi Tha Kamal Ka Tha Rooh Tak Utarte Utarte Jism Ko Khokhla Kar Gaya
Tum Mujhe Jitni Izzat De Sakte The De Di Ab Tum Dekho Mera Sabar Aur Meri Khamoshi
Khan Milta Hai Ab Koi Smajhne Wala Jobhi Milta Hai Samjha Ke Chala Jata Hai
Kisi Ko Kitna Bhi Pyaar De Do Aakhir Me Use Thoda Kam Hi Lagta Hai
Mujhe Bi Yaad Rakhna Jab Likho Tarikh Wafa Ki Maine Bhi Lutaya Hai Mohabbat Main Sakoon Apna
Vaqt Se Pahale Haadason Se Lada Hoon Mai Apanee Umr Se Kayi Saal Bada Hoon
Khuda Ne Kismat Me Saanse Likhi Thi Insano Ne Rok Di
Haan Yaad Aaya Iske Aakhri Alfaz Ye The Agar Ji Sako To Ji Lena Agar Mar Jao To Accha Hai
Meri Wafa Ki Kadar Na Kee Apani Pasand Pe Aitbaar Kiya Hota Suna Hai Vo Unaki Bhi Na Huee Mujhe Chhod Diya Tha To Use Apana Liya Hota
Zakhm De Kar Na Pooch Too Mere Dard Ki Shiddat Dar To Fir Dard Hai Kam Kya Jyada Kya
Muddaton Baad Bhi Nahi Milte Hum Jaise Nayab Log Tere Haath Kiya Lag Gaye Tumne To Hamhe Aam Samjh Liya
Bahut The Mere Bhi Is Duniya Mein Apna Phir Hua Ishq Ham Aur Laavaaris Ho Gae
Meri Har Shayari Dil Ke Dard Ko Karta Bayan Tumhari Aankh Na Bhar Aaye Kahi Padhte Padhte
Inhe Apna Bhi Nahi Sakta Magat Itna Kya Kam Hai Kuch Muddatein Haseen Khwabon Main Kho Kar Ji Liya Humne
Kabool Ai Karate Hai Tere Kadmo Me Gir Kar Sajae Maut Manzoor Hai Magar Ab Mohabbat Nahi Karani
Chup Hai Kisi Sabr Se To Patthar Na Smajh Hme Dil Pe Asar Hua Hai Teri Baat Baat Ka
Humne Kab Kaha Mohabbat Nahi Mili Humko Mohabaat To Mili Magar Tum Se Na Mili Humko
Khamoshiyan Kar Dete Hai Bayan To Alag Baat Hai Kuch Dard Hai Ji Lafzo Me Utare Nhi Jate
Badi Hasrat Thi Koi Hamhe Toot Kar Chahe Lekin Hum Hi Toot Gaye Kisi Ko Chahte Chahte
Ab To Aadat Si Ban Gayi Hai Tum Dard Do Hum Muskurayenge
Wo Jinko Dekh Kar Aankhon Main Asoon Jate Hai Wahi Kuch Log Zindagi Viraan Kar Jate Hai
Duba Hai Mera Badan Mere Hi Khoon Se Ye Kanch Ke Tukdo Pe Bharose Ki Saza Hai
Be Zuban Badalo Ko Apni Dastan Suna Raha Hai Koi Lagta Hai Aasmano Ko Suna Raha Hai Koi Dard Ki Dastan
Suni Thi Humne Gajlo Me Judai Ki Baatein Ab Khud Pe Beeti To Haqiqat Ka Andaza Hua
Main Chaha Tha Ki Jakham Bhar Jaye Jakham Hi Jakham Bhar Gaye Mujh Main
Meri Chahat Dekhni Hai To Mere Dil Par Apna Dil Rakhkar Dekh Teri Dhadkan Naa Bhadjaye To Meri Mohabbat Thukra Dena
GalatFehmi Ki Gunjaish Nahi Sachchi Mohabbat Mein Jahan Kirdaar Halka Ho Kahani Doob Jati Hai
Hone Do Mukhatib Mujhe Aaj In Honto Se Abbas Baat Na To Ye Samjh Rahe Hai Par Guftagu Jari Hai
Udasiyan Ishq Ki Pehchan Hai Muskura Diye To Ishq Bura Maan Jayega
Kuch Is Adaa Se Haal Sunana Hamare Dil Wo Khud Hi Keh De Kidi Bhul Jana Buri Baat Hai
Mana Ki Usse Bichadkar Hum Umr Bhar Rote Rhe Par Mere Mar Jane Ke Baad Umr Bhar Roaega Wo
Dil Me Tumhari Apni Kabhi Chor Jayenge Aankho Me Intzaar Ki Lakeer Chor Jayenge
Kisi Masoom Lamhe Main Kisi Masoom Chehre Se Mohabbat Ki Nahi Jati Mohabbat Ho Jati Hai
Kareeb Aao To Shayad Hame Samjh Loge Ye Duriya To Kewal Fasle Bdhati Hai
Tere Ishq Me Is Tarah Mai Neelam Ho Jao Aakhri Ho Meri Boli Aur Main Tere Naam Ho Jau
Aap Jab Tak Rahungi Aankhon Mein Najara Bankar Roj Aayenge Meri Duniya Mein Ujala Bankar
Usne Jab Se Bewafai Ki Hai Mai Pyar Ki Raah Me Chal Naa Ska Usne To Kisi Aur Ka Haath Tham Liyabas Fir Kabhi Smbhal Nhi Saka
Ek Hi Khwab Dekha Hai Kai Baar Maine Teri Shadi Me Uljhi Hai Chahiye Mere Ghar Ki
Tumhe Meri Mohabbat Ki Kasam Such Batana Gale Main Daal Kar Bahen Kisse Sikhaya Hai
Nhi Pta Ki Wo Kabhi Meri Thi Bhi Ya Nhi Mujhe Ye Pta Hai Bas Ki Mai To Tha Umr Bas Usi Ka Rha
Tumne Dekha Kabhi Chand Se Pani Girte Hue Maine Dekha Ye Manzar Tu Me Chehra Dhote Hue
Thukra De Koi Cahat Ko Tu Has Ke Seh Lena Piyar Ki Tabiyat Main Zabar Jasti Nahi Hoti
Tera Pata Nahi Par Mera Dil Kabhi Taiyar Nahi Hoga Mujhe Tere Alawa Kabi Kisi Aur Se Pyaar Nhi Hoga
Dil Mein Aahat Si Hui Rooh Mein Dastak Goonji Kis Ki Khushboo Yeh Mujhe Mere SirHane Aayi
Umar Bhar Likhte Rahe Phir Bhi Warak Sada Raha Jane Kiya Lafz The Jo Hum Likh Nahi Paye
Lga Ke Phool Haathon Se Usne Kaha Chupke Se Agar Yaha Koi Nahi Hota To Phool Ki Jagah Tum Hote
Jaan Jab Pyari Thi Marne Ka Shauk Tha Ab Marne Ka Shauk Hai To Katil Nahi Mil Raha
Sirf Yaad Bankar Na Rah Jaye Pyaar Mera Kabhi Kabhi Kuch Waqt Ke Liye Aaya Karo
Mujh Ko Samjhaya Na Karo Ab To Ho Chuki Hoon Mujh Main Mohabbat Mashwara Hoti To Tum Se Puch Leta
Unho Ne Kha Bhut Bolte Ho Ab Kya Bras Jaaoge Humne Kha Jis Din Chup Ho Gya Tum Tras Jaao Ge
Kuch Aise Hasde Zindagi Main Hote Hai Ke Insaan To Bach Jata Hai Magar Zinda Nahi Rehta
Khwahisho Ka Mohalla Bhut Bda Hota Hai Behtar Hai Hum Jarooro Ki Gali Me Mud Jaye
Mujhe Parwah Nahin Duniya Khafa Rahe Bas Itni Si Dua Hai Dost Mehraban Rahe
Waqt Ki Yaari To Har Koi Karta Hai Ae Mere Dosto Mza Ta Tab Aata Hai Jab Waqt Badal Jaye Par Yaar Na Badle
Har Nayi Cheez Achi Hoti Hai Lekin Dost Purane Hi Acche Hote Hain
Ae Dost Ab Kya Likhu Teri Tarif Me Bda Khash Hai Tu Meri Zindagi Me
Dosto Se Dosti Rakha Karo Tabiyat Mast Rahegi Ye Vo Haqeem Hain Jo Alfaaz Se Dwa Kiya Karte Hain
Gungunana To Takdir Me Likha Ke Laye The Khilkhilana Dosto Se Tohfe Me Mil Gaya
Ek Tawiz Hamari Gehri Dosti Ko Chahiye Jara Si Dekhi Nahi Ki Nazar Lagne Lagti Hai
Siyah Raat Me Jalte Hai Jugnu Ki Tarah Dilo Ke Zakhm Bhi Dosto Kamal Hote Hai
Jiski Shaam Achchhi Uski Raat Achchi Jiske Dost Achchhe Usaki Zindagi Achchi
Bach Ke Rehna Aise Logo Se Ae Mere Dost Jiske Dil Me Bhi Ek Dimag Rahta Hai
Jinda Raha To Tumhara Saath Nibhaunga Dosto Agar Kabhi Bhool Gaya To Samajh Lena Ki.Shadi Ho Gayi
Pine Se Kar Chuka Tha Touba Dosto Badlo Ka Rang Dekh Niyat Badal Gayi
Sadagi Agar Ho Lafjo Mein Yakin Mano Pyar Bepanah Or Dost Bemisal Mil Hi Jate Hain
Tez Raftaar Zindagi Ka Ye Aalam Hai Dosto Subah Ke Gum Saam Ko Purane Lagte Hai
Kitni Choti Si Duniya Hai Meri Ek Mai Hoon Aur Ek Dosti Teri
Log Puchte Hai Etne Gum Me Bhi Khush Kyu Ho Maine Kha Duniya Sath De Na De Mera Dost To Mere Sath Hai
Gungunana Toh Takdir Mein Likha Kar Laye The Khilkhilana Doston Se Tohfe Mein Mil Gaya
Hum Waqt Guzarne Ke Liye Dosto Nahi Rakhte Dosto Ko Sath Rahne Ke Liye Waqt Rakhte Hai
Dosti Mein Dost Dost Ka Khuda Hota Hai Mahsoos Tab Hota Hai Jab Wo Juda Hota Hai
Dosti Nahi Pahli Aas Ho Tum Risto Me Nhi Vishwas Ho Tum Pyar Bhare Din Ki Shuruaat Ho Tum
Chhu Na Saku Aasman Ko Toh Koi Gham Nahi Bas Chup Jao Dosto Ke Dil Ko Ye Bhi Toh Aasman Se Kam Nai
Yoo Asar Dala Hai Matlabi Logo Ne Duniya Par shlam Bhi Karo To Log Samajhte Hai Ki Jarur Koi Kaam Hoga
Manzil Par Pahuch Kar Likhunga Mai In Rasto Ki Mushkilon Ka Zikr Abhi To Bas Aage Badhne Se Fursat Nahi
Muskuraya Karo Isliye Nahi Ki Aapke Paas Muskurane Ka Karan Hai Esliye Ki Kisi Ko Ratti Bhar Fark Nhi Padta Aapke Aasuao Se
Dard Se Dosti Ho Gyi Yaaro Zindagi Bedard Ho Gyi Yaaro Kya Hua Jo Jal Gaya Aashiyan Hamara Door Tak Roshni Ho Gayi Yaaro
Masla To Sirf Ehsaso Ka Hai Rishte To Bina Mile Bhi Sadiya Guzaar Dete Hai
Ek Khoobsurat Sa Rishta Yuin Khatm Ho Gya Wo Dosti Nibhate Rahe Aur Hame Ishq Ho Gaya
Kon Kehta Hai Ki Dosti Barabar Walo Me Hoti Hai Subah Ke Gum Saam Ko Purane Lagte Hai
Dave Mohabbat Ke Mujhe Nahi Aate Yaaro Ek Jaan Hai Jab Dil Chahe Mang Lena
Meri Mizaaz Ko Samajhne Ke Liye Bas Itna Hi Kafi Hai Mai Uska Hargiz Nhi Hota Jo Har Ek Ka Ho Jaye
Jab Mahasoos Ho Sara Shahar Tumase Jalane Laga Samajh Lena Tumhaara Naam Chalane Laga
Aksar Jal Jaate Hain Mere Andaaz Se Mere Dushman Kyo Ki Ek Muddat Se Maine Na Dost Badale Na Mohabbat
Agr Pyar Se Koy Phook Mare To Bujh Jayenge Nafrat Se To Bade Bade Toofan Bujh Gye Mujhe Bujhane Me
Jeet Hasil Karani Ho To Qabiliyat Badhao Qismat Ki Roti To Kutton Ko Bhi Mila Karati Hai
Tamanna Tere Jism Ki Hoti To Chen Lete Duniya Se Mohabbat Teri Rooh Se Ki Isalie Mangate Hain Khuda Se
Teri Mohabbat Pe Mera Haq To Nhi Par Dil Chahta Hai Aakhri Sans Tak Tera Intzaar Karoo
Ishq Ki Patange Udaana Chhod Di Hamane Varana Har Hasina Ki Chhat Par Hamaare Hi Dhaage Hua Karate The
Isi Baat Se Meri Shoharat Ka Andaaza Laga Lena Mujhe Vo Salaam Karate Hain Jinhen Tum Salaam Karate Ho
Jisko Jana Hai Wo Chala Jata Hai Use Hmare Rone Se Bhi Koy Fark Nhi Padta
Khote Sikke Jo Abhi Abhi Chale Hain Baajar Mein Woh Kamiyan Nikal Rahe Hain Mere Kirdaar Mein
Abhi Shisha Hun Sabki Aankho Mein Chubhta Hun Jab Aayina Banunga Sara Jahan Dekhega
Hum Na Badlenge Waqt Ki Raftar Ke Saath Jab Bhi Milenge Andaaz Purana Hoga
Muqam Vo Chaahie Ki Jis Din Haaru Us Din Jeetane Vaale Se Zyaada Charche Meree Haar Ke Hon
Kisi Ke Pairo Me Girakar Qamayabi Paane Se Achchha Hai Apane Pairo Par Chalakar Kuchh Banane Ki Thaan Lon
Paida To Sabhi Marne Ke Liye Hi Hote Hai Ae Dosto Par Maiut Aesi Honi Chahiye Jis Par Jmana Afsosh Kare
Dushmano Ko Sazaa Dene Ki Ek Tehzeeb Hai Meri Main Haath Nahi Uthhata Bas Najron Se Gira Deta Hun
Pyaar Ishq Mohabbat Sab Dhoke Bazi Hai Apni Laife Me Sirf Attitude Hi Kafi Hai
Bewaqt. Bewahaj. Behisaab. Muskura Deta Hun Aadhe Dushmano Ko Toh Yun Hi Haraa Deta Hun
Kal Se Ek Hi Kaam Hoga Hamara Hi Naam Hoga Aur Dushmano Ka Kaam Tamaam Hoga
Ruthha Hua Hai Mujhse Iss Baat Par Zamana Shamil Nahin Hai Meri Fitrat Mein Sar Jhukana
Kyu Na Guroor Karoon Mai Apne Aap Pe Mujhe Usne Chaha Hai Jiske Chahne Wale Hazaar The
Aksar Wohi Log Uthate Hain Hum Par Ungliyan Jinki Humein Chhune Ki Aukaat Nahi Hoti
Usne Kha Mahgi Padegi Ye Dushmani Maine Bhi Kha Sasta To Mai Kajal Bhi Nahi Lagti
Aisa Nahi Ke Kad Apne Ghat Gaye Chadar Ko Apni Dekh Kar Hum Khud Simat Gaye
Dil Me Bhut Dard Hai Doctor Ke Pas Gaya Doctor Ne Girlfriend Ki Kami Batai
Agar Jaldbazi Mein Shaadi Karke Jeevan Bigaad Loge Soch Samajh Kar Karoge Toh Kaun Sa Teer Maar Loge
Jisko Sugar Hai Kripya Wo Log Sabr Ka Karen Kyukee Sabr Ka Phal Meetha Hota Hai
Maaf Karo Parmeshwar Yeh Bhaari Bhool Humari Hai Shaadi Kar Li Jis Se Humne Woh Toh Nirdhan Nari Hai
Too Tik Tok Ki Rani Main Fecbook Ka Raja Milana Hai To Whatsapp Pe Aaja
Biwi Bhi Haq Jtati Hai Maa Bhi Haq Jtati Hai Shaadi Ke Baad Aadmi Kashmir Ho Jata Hai
Maine Zindagi Se Pucha Tu Khoobsurat Hai Badsurat Palat Kar Usne Jawab Diya Jaise Badmash Teri Soorat
Hamari Kismat Hi Kuchh Aisi Nikli Ghalib Zameen Mili Toh Banjar Aur Admin Mila Toh Kanjar
Mera Dil Bhi Le Gayi Mera Chain Bhi Le Gayi Had Ho Gayi Jab Jab Maine Dekha Wo Mera Paanch Rupaiya Ka Pen Bhi Le Gayi
Kuch Aise Hadse Bhi Hote Hai Zindgi Mein Dost Hajaar Ka Note Rakhne Wale Sau Rupaye Mangte Hain
Meri Aankho Me Tum Tumhari Aankho Me Mai Par Meri Jaan Ye Kachre Ke Liye Kha Se Aa Gyi Jgah
NoteBandi Ka Ek Yeh Bhi Asar Najar Aaya Woh Bewafa Fir Se Mere Dar Pe Nazar Aaya
Gussa To Bhut Aaya Jab Wo Kamini Boli Just Go To Hell Lekin Uski Frend Ko Dekh Kar Dil Bola All Is Well All Is Well
Kis Kis Ka Naam Lein Apni Barbadi Mein Bahut Log Aaye The Duayein Dene Shaadi Mein
Aajtak Smajh Me Nhi Aaya Dil Me To Huddi Hi Nhi Hota To Sala Toot Kha Se Jata Hai
Dil Mai Koi Gham Nahi Baaton Mein Koi Dam Nahi Yeh Grup Hai Nawabon Ka Yaha Koi Kisi Se Kam Nahi
Tik Tok Wale Khud Ko Bollywood Ke Star Samajhte Hai Aur PUBG Wale Khud Ko Aarmi Ka Zwaan
Usi Din Se Whatsapp Se Nafrat Ho Gayi Ghalib Jab Baal Katwane Ke Liye Admin Ne Chanda Maang Liya
Padhai Likhai Chhod Kar Khoob Khelo Pubg Baad Mein Naukri Na Mile To Bechana Aaloo Gobhee Sabji
Kabhi Matlab Ke Liye To Kabhi Bas Dilagi Ke Liye Har Koy Mohabbat Dhoodh Raha Hai Apni Life Ke Liye
Mat Chhodna Mere Haath Tum Zindagi Mein Kabhi Ka Main Zinda Hun Tumhare Saath Hi Rahne Do
Mein Tabha Hun Tere Piyaar Mein Tujhe Dusro Ka Khayal Hai Kuch Mere Masle Par Gaur Kar Meri Zindagi Ka Sawal Hai
Pal Bhar Tere Saath Me Jo Sukoon Mila Tha Kaash Wo Pal Meri Life Ka Aakhri Pal Hota
Mujhe Zindagi Ki Duaa Dene Wale Hansi Aa Rahi Hai Teri Saadgi Par
Azeeb Tarah Se Gujar Rahi H Zindagi Socha Kuch Kiya Kuch Huaa Kuch Aur Mila Kuch
Baat Sirf Itni Si Hai Life Ki Raho Me Saath Calne Walo Ko Humsfar Nhi Kahte
Har Roz Gir Kar Bhi Mukammal Khade Hain Ae Zindagi Dekh Mere Honle Tujhse Bhi Bade Hain
Kaaton Mein Rahe Kar Bhi Hum Zindagi Je Lete Hai Har Zakm Ko Apne Haaton Se See Lete Hai Jis Haath Ko Keh Diya Dost Ka Haath Hum Us Haath Se Zaher Bhi Pi Lete Hai
Jitne Din Tak Ji Gai Bas Utni Hi Hai Life Mitti Ke Gullko Ki Koy Umar Nhi Hoti
Ye Mareeje Ishq Ka Haal Hai Ke Ye Zindagi Bhi Behaal Hai Kabhi Dard Hai To Dawa Nahi Jo Dawa Mili To Sifa Nahi
Likhne Wale Ne Kiya Khub Likha Hai Zindagi Jab Mayus Hoti Hai Tabhi To Mahsoos Hoti Hai
Tumko Jab Bojh Lagne Lage Saath To Bta Dena Hum Chupchap Life Se Mukar Jayenge
Kaaton Mein Rahe Kar Bhi Hum Zindagi Je Lete Hai Har Zakm Ko Apne Haaton Se See Lete Hai Jis Haath Ko Keh Diya Dost Ka Haath Hum Us Haath Se Zaher Bhi Pi Lete Hai
Socha Tha Pyaar Badal Dega Meri Life Par Esne To Life Ko Barbaad Hi Kar Diya
Chup Chaap Guzaar Denge Tere Bina Bhi Ye Life Logo Ko Sikha Denge Mohabbat Aese Bhi Hoti Hai
Ek Sans Bhi Puri Nhi Hoti Tere Khayalo Ke Bina Tumne Ye Kaise Socha Ki Hum Life Gujar Denge
Bhut Kuch Kho Chuka Hoon Ae Life Tujhe Swarne Ki Koshish Me Ab Bas Ye Jo Kuch Log Mere Hai Inhe Mera Hi Rahne De
Kisi Roz Hogi Roshan Meri Bhi Life Intezar Subah Ka Nahi Kisi Ke Laut Aane Ka Hai
Pahle Jo Log Aapka Mzaak Btate Hai Aur Haste Hai Aese Log Safalta Milne Par Aapki Hi Nakal Karte Hai
Intzaar Karne Walo Ko Kewal Utna Hi Milta Hai Jitna Koshish Karne Wale Chor Dete Hai
Ekaant Me Kathin Prishram Karo Tumhari Safalta Chor Mcha Degi
Har Subah Hum Bus Unko Hi Yaad Karte Hain Jo Is Dil Ki Dhadkan Mein Hamesha Rehte Hain
Jo Girne Se Darta Hai Woh Kabhi Udaan Nhi Bhar Sakte
Gussa Bhut Hi Chatur Hota Hai Aksar Apne Se Kamzor Wakti Par Hi Nikalta Hai
Musibat Sab Par Aati Hai Koi Bikhar Jata Hai Koi Nikhar Jata Hai
Khoobsurat Log Hamesha Acche Nhi Hote Lekin Achche Log Hmesha Khoobsurat Hote Hai
Chejo Ki Kimat Milne Se Pahle Hoti Hai Aur Insano Ki Kimat Khone Ke Baad Hoti Hai
Bita Hua Kal Kal Badla Nhi Ja Sakta Hai Lekin Aane Wala Kal Hamesha Aapke Haath Me Hota Hai
Hum Agar Kisi Chez Ki Kalpna Kar Sakte Hai To Use Sakar Bhi Kar Sakte Hai
Kamyab Log Apne Faisle Se Duniya Badal Dete Hai Nakamyab Log Duniya Ke Dar Se Apne Faisle Badal Dete Hai
Raato Ko Need Aana Aasan Baat Nhi Hai Uske Liye Pura Din Imandaar Rahna Padta Hai
Agar Aap Duniya Se Apne Liye Sarvsresth Pana Chahte Hai To Aapko Duniya Ko Apna Sarvseth Dena Bhi Hoga
Jab Dusro Ko Bdalna Mushkil Hota Hai Tab Khud Me Badlav Karna Hi Accha Hai
Jin Logo Ke Paas Ummeed Rakhti Hai Aese Log Lakh Baar Harne Ke Baad Bhi Kabhi Nhi Harte
Sambhav Aur Asambhav Ke Beech Ki Duri Weqti Ke Nishchay Par Nirbhar Karti Hai
Lgatar Ho Rhi Asfaltaao Se Nirash Nhi Hona Chahiye Kabhi Kabhi Gucche Ki Aakhri Chabi Tala Khol Deti Hai
Din Mein Kab Bhala Raat Ki Rani Ne Fiza Mehkai Hai Isiliye Shayad Sehar Soya Aur Teri Khushbu Aai Hai.
Sirf Sapno Se Kuch Nhi Hota Safalta Prayaso Se Hasil Hoti Hai
Samay Na Lagao Tay Karne Me Aapko Kya Karna Hai Warna Smay Tay Karlega Aapka Kya Karna Hai
Khud Ki Trkki Me Itna Waqt Lgado Ki Dusre Ki Burai Karne Ka Waqt Hi Nhi Mile
